alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Fillmore; Hamilton; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Clay, southeastern Adams, southwestern York, southeastern Hamilton and northwestern Fillmore Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 713 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a few thunderstorm near Glenvil, or 10 miles southeast of Hastings, moving northeast at 55 mph. These storms and additional storms that develop over the advisory area will be capable of strong wind gusts. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Harvard and Clay Center around 725 PM CDT. Saronville around 730 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Stockham, Henderson and Hampton. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 330 and 345. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
